root.message: The UNIT_MEASURE field for indicator 1-2-2, translated into en
root.data:
Proportion of population living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions [1.2.2] (SI_POV_NMPI) (%)

Average proportion of deprivations for people multidimensionally poor [1.2.2] (SD_MDP_ANDI) (%)

Proportion of children living in child-specific multidimensional poverty [1.2.2] (SD_MDP_CSMP) (%)

Proportion of households living in multidimensional poverty [1.2.2] (SD_MDP_MUHHC) (%)
